name: Triple Play Canasta Scorecard
description:
Keep score of your Canasta card games with this easy to use app. Handles any of three variations of Canasta: Classic Canasta, Hand and Foot, and Triple Play.

This does not include the actual card game. It is a tool to help keep score when playing with real cards and real people. It allows you to enjoy the game and other player's company instead of getting frustrated doing the math between rounds.

Does not currently support custom scoring.
